short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A virtual assistant that connects to your to-do list on Notion.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A virtual assistant that connects to your to-do list on Notion and executes tasks for you.

This extension helps you manage your to-do list on Notion with the assistance of a local LLM (Language Learning Model) that you can connect via localhost (instructions mentioned on the website and popup). Follow the instructions to set up and configure the extension, and enjoy a more productive workflow.

Note this extension has no external communication or data processing and everything happens on your local environment. Have fun!
